page.title: 05Law and Order-Broughton/Holt
page.content: POLICING This rural area is policed by two police officers one male and one female - based at Melksham some three miles away. The area is patrolled by car combined with foot patrols. Back-up cover is provided by Melksham police station and by divisional traffic patrol vehicles. COURTS Local magistrates courts are held weekly at Melksham and fortnightly at Bradford-on-Avon. Serious crimes would normally be heard at Swindon Crown Court before a judge and jury. CRIMES The crimes which predominate in this area are minor thefts and instances of criminal damage.
